title: UALR institute announces 14 new Arkansas Civil Rights Heritage Trail honorees (University of Arkansas at ...
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas at Little Rock ) The University of Arkansas at Little Rock Institute on Race and Ethnicityhas announced the names of the honorees for the 2015 Arkansas Civil Rights Heritage Trail . This year's theme is
